title: LF DUO (bronze)
body:
So yeah, I want a duo partner that is positive and not going to rage at my or the teams mistakes (or at least do it quietly :P) 
I would like him/her to be friendly. I would like like them to work with me to get higher through the rankings. I never really played LoL hardcore since it's release, just been off and on. But now I really want to go as high as I can go. 
Skype is probs the best means of communication.....

Thanks, Spell.

replies.body: my ign is maoriboyalex add me ill be keen
your 100% better off doing it by yourself
